name: Textploder
description: In an effort to identify novel ways of using technology to convert hand-written text into a digital format, I developed a space-shooter style game that performed this task using the principles of Human Computation. The idea was that Computer Vision may not work well in every domain and that humans are still pretty good at making sense of bad handwriting. This project combines technology and human intuition seamlessly. The game was made in Unity and deployed on Amazon MTurk
